titleStmt.title: A president for a prince Wherein is to be seene by the testimonie of auncient writers, the duetie of kings, princes, and gouernours. Collected and gathered by Anthonie Russhe, Doctor of Diuinitie. Seene and allowed, according to the order appoynted.
titleStmt.author: Rush, Anthony, 1537-1577.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
